text: Temple College Vocational Nursing Program VNSG 1409: Nursing Health and Illness II Module 7 Exam Blueprint Williams Hopper Chapter(s) Topic No. of Questions 13 Care of Clients with Emergent Conditions and Disaster/Bioterrorism Response 12 53 Integumentary Function, Assessment, and Therapeutic Measures 12 54 Nursing Care of Clients with Skin Disorders 12 55 Nursing Care of Clients with Burns 12 Dosage Calculations 2 Total 50 This exam will have 1 Case Study/Bow Tie question and 1 Matrix question.
